title.intro: One Place for All SAFE Apps

subTitle.getStarted: All the apps you need to try the SAFE Network
subTitle.intro: A one-stop shop to access all SAFE Apps and manage instant app updates.
subTitle.basic_settings: Choose some basic settings. You can always change these later.

title.restart_app_now: %{name} needs to restart to finish updating.

title.server_timeout: Download Server has timed out. Installation of %{name} has been paused.

title.update_available: Update Available! %{name} %{version} is ready to install. What’s New…

message.close_app: SAFE Network App requires %{name} to be closed to complete updating.
